channel.title: Turn money into checks. (and how do i make items stackable?)
channel.description:
How do i turn a 1B stack into a check?
EXAMPLE: i have 1000M in my inventory. i wanna be able to type in a command like "::check" and it turns into a token that represents 1B, and a command that can turn it back to nrmal by doing "::uncheck"
#2, How do i make that item stackable so players can keep in their banks?
Thanks.

item.title: Turn money into checks. (and how do i make items stackable?)
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:14, topic:419649”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=522195.msg3797296#msg3797296 date=1319747072]

Fixed whatever his names was code…

@Super, you’re getting better with programming I remember like 2 months ago when you were just a little noobie.

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("goldbag")) {
			if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 5000000)) {
				c.getItems().addItem(10831, 1);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 5000000);
				c.sendMessage("You purchase a gold bag for 5 million coins.");
			} else { 
				c.sendMessage("You need atleast 5 Million coins to purchase a gold bag.");
			}
		}

still is.
[/quote]

No… He’s not, have you even seen any of his recent work?[/quote]

a joke me and him are friends.

Read full topic

item.source: Turn money into checks. (and how do i make items stackable?)

item.title: Turn money into checks. (and how do i make items stackable?)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:11, topic:419649”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=522195.msg3797251#msg3797251 date=1319745223]

Ignore the idiot above, he has no idea what he’s talking about.
You can change the tax bag id into a custom item ID such as your checks it really doesn’t matter.

Clickingitem.java

if(itemId == 10831) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,2147000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 2147000000); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.sendMessage("You fill the bag with 2147m."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 2147m to fill this bag."); } } if(itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995,2147000000); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); c.sendMessage("You empty the bag and recieve 2147m."); }

Horrible. Use an array list.
[/quote]
Don’t call me out, it was made to be something he could fix up himself.
Not trying to start something either, just saying.[/quote]
It’s bad code that can be abused. Would be better to do it the correct way, and leave some code out then let him finish it. That way you learn and he learns.

Read full topic

item.title: Turn money into checks. (and how do i make items stackable?)
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

em0bunny:

Im not sure that anyone knows or has done this on their server yet. Its a great idea though. You would go into the command section in the source and type in some intricate code. Im not sure what this code would read though. Sorry.

Why are you being such a tool, If you can’t help don’t post.

@Acorn_ This code would work although could probably be abused and if this person’s server has dupes. People would find themselfs having multiple stacks of max cash, Another problem is, How f**ked up must the economy be on your server to be to require people to require ways of storing multiple stacks of max cash.

Also how would players get these bags, Possibly a command to buy a bag? Something like this possibly?

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("goldbag")) {
                                if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,5000000)) {
                                c.getItems().addItem(10831,1);
                                c.sendMessage("You purchase a gold bag for 5 million coins.");
                                } else {
                                c.sendMessage("You need atleast 5 Million coins to purchase a gold bag.");
                                }
                     }
